title: 20: The Four Senses of Scripture
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Dante recorded what folks had been doing for a long time as they read scripture. In this episode, we run you through Dante's method for studying scripture.
itunes:author: Graeme, A.J., and Bees
itunes:subtitle: Dante's take on exegesis
